price: 115 La parole immuable de ton Seigneur s’est accomplie, toute de vérité et de justice. Il est Celui qui entend tout et sait tout.
arabic: وَتَمَّتۡ كَلِمَتُ رَبِّكَ صِدۡقٗا وَعَدۡلٗاۚ لَّا مُبَدِّلَ لِكَلِمَٰتِهِۦۚ وَهُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: watammat kalimatu rabbika ṣid'qan waʿadlan lā mubaddila likalimātihi wahuwa al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
